official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim the month of May 1978 as "National Car Care Month."

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the month of May, 1978, as "National Car Care Month."

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim the month of May 1978 as "National Car Care Month."
